--- title: "It's me, hi!" pagetitle: "Jake Thompson" main-photo: /assets/wjakethompson/img/wjt-2022.png title-block-banner: "#009FB7" engine: knitr format: html: template-partials: - ../_partials/title-block-link-buttons/title-block.html header-includes: > resources: - ../assets/blog-listing.scss --- ::: {.cell} ::: ::: {.grid} ::: {.g-col-12 .g-col-sm-4} ```{=html}
``` ::: ::: {.g-col-12 .g-col-sm-8} I'm the assistant director of psychometrics at [Accessible Teaching, Learning, and Assessment Systems (ATLAS)](https://atlas.ku.edu), a strategic center within the [Achievement and Assessment Institute](https://aai.ku.edu) at the [University of Kansas](https://www.ku.edu). I received a PhD in educational psychology and research from the University of Kansas' [School of Education and Human Sciences](https://soehs.ku.edu/) in 2018. I am the lead psychometrician for the [Dynamic Learning Maps®](https://www.dynamiclearningmaps.org) alternate assessments, which are administered annually to students with significant cognitive disabilities from grades 3--12 in 22 states. I have also led the psychometric work innovative assessment projects such as the [Innovations in Science Map, Assessment and Report Technologies (I-SMART)](https://www.ismart.works/) and [Pathways for Instructionally Embedded Assessment (PIE)](https://pie.atlas4learning.org/). In all of these assessments, I am primarily focused on the application of diagnostic psychometric models to improve instructional decision-making and student learning. My research interests also include Bayesian modeling, data visualization, and R programming. I am the author of several [R](https://www.r-project.org) packages including [measr](https://www.measr.info) for estimating and evaluating diagnostic classification models and [taylor](https://taylor.wjakethompson.com) for accessing lyrics and audio data for [Taylor Swift's](https://www.taylorswift.com/) discography. I also regularly lead workshops on how to use R and [Stan](https://www.mc-stan.org) for [applying diagnostic classification models](https://stancon2023.measr.info) and the [tidyverse](https://www.tidyverse.org) for [data science](https://tidyds-2021.wjakethompson.com/). ::: :::
